     *\r

     */\r
    fixedDecimalLength?: number\r
    /**\r
     * Placeholder if there is no value\r
     */\r
    placeholder?: string\r
    /**\r
     * Include a prefix eg. \xA3\r
     */\r
    prefix?: string\r
    /**\r
     * Include a suffix eg. \u20AC\r
     */\r
    suffix?: string\r
    /**\r

     */\r
    step?: number\r

     * Separator between integer part and fractional part of value.\r
     *\r
     * This cannot be a number\r
     */\r
    decimalSeparator?: string\r
    /**\r
     * Separator between thousand, million and billion\r
     *\r
     * This cannot be a number\r
     */\r
    groupSeparator?: string\r
    /**\r
     * Disable auto adding separator between values eg. 1000 -> 1,000\r
     *\r
     * Default = false\r
     */\r
    disableGroupSeparators?: boolean\r
    /**\r
     * Disable abbreviations (m, k, b)\r
     *\r
     * Default = false\r
     */\r
    disableAbbreviations?: boolean\r
    /**\r
     * International locale config, examples:\r
     *   { locale: 'ja-JP', currency: 'JPY' }\r
     *   { locale: 'en-IN', currency: 'INR' }\r
     *\r
     * Any prefix, groupSeparator or decimalSeparator options passed in\r
     * will override Intl Locale config\r
     */\r
    intlConfig?: IntlConfig\r
